products.title: Bexley Zinc Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bexley zinc roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Introduce sutble shantung style weave fabrics into your interior styling with their contemporary bexley range.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2233 fabric colour: zinc material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Bexley Zinc
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bexley zinc standard vertical blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard vertical blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	louvre width: 89mm
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
 	controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

 	min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm
 	composition: polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets.
